tvShows.title: The Falcon and the Winter Soldier
tvShows.genre: Sci-Fi & Fantasy, Action & Adventure, Drama, War & Politics
tvShows.synopsis: Following the events of “Avengers: Endgame”, the Falcon, Sam Wilson and the Winter Soldier, Bucky Barnes team up in a global adventure that tests their abilities, and their patience.

tvShows.title: The Good Doctor
tvShows.synopsis: A young surgeon with Savant syndrome is recruited into the surgical unit of a prestigious hospital. The question will arise: can a person who doesn't have the ability to relate to people actually save their lives

tvShows.title: WandaVision
tvShows.synopsis: Wanda Maximoff and Vision—two super-powered beings living idealized suburban lives—begin to suspect that everything is not as it seems.

tvShows.title: The Walking Dead
tvShows.synopsis: Sheriff's deputy Rick Grimes awakens from a coma to find a post-apocalyptic world dominated by flesh-eating zombies. He sets out to find his family and encounters many other survivors along the way.

tvShows.title: Game of Thrones
tvShows.synopsis: Seven noble families fight for control of the mythical land of Westeros. Friction between the houses leads to full-scale war. All while a very ancient evil awakens in the farthest north. Amidst the war, a neglected military order of misfits, the Night's Watch, is all that stands between the realms of men and icy horrors beyond.

tvShows.title: Marvel Studios: Legends
tvShows.synopsis: Revisit the epic heroes, villains and moments from across the MCU in preparation for the stories still to come. Each dynamic segment feeds directly into the upcoming series — setting the stage for future events. This series weaves together the many threads that constitute the unparalleled Marvel Cinematic Universe.

tvShows.title: I Am...
tvShows.synopsis: Each hour-long film follows a different women as they experience “moments that are emotionally raw, thought-provoking and utterly personal”.

tvShows.title: Elite
tvShows.synopsis: When three working class kids enroll in the most exclusive school in Spain, the clash between the wealthy and the poor students leads to tragedy.

tvShows.title: Peaky Blinders
tvShows.synopsis: A gangster family epic set in 1919 Birmingham, England and centered on a gang who sew razor blades in the peaks of their caps, and their fierce boss Tommy Shelby, who means to move up in the world.

tvShows.title: Sherlock
tvShows.synopsis: A modern update finds the famous sleuth and his doctor partner solving crime in 21st century London.
